attributes.action: Prince William, Duke of Cambridge wishes to be Crowned King not Prince Charles
attributes.additional_details: Upon Her Majesty's death, or abdiction, the UK should install an elected regent until Prince William, Duke of Cambridge wishes to succeed.
attributes.background:
I believe the succession of Charles, Prince of Wales to the British throne would have a devistatingly negative effect upon the UK, the UK's place in the world and to the monarchy itself.
This would be a highly beneficial, and positive, act for the UK and would ensure ongoing popular
